      Services

      Our Services

      We offer a comprehensive range of pain management, home physiotherapy services in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida & Ghaziabad, including spinal physiotherapy, post-surgical rehabilitation, cardiopulmonary conditioning (CPC), geriatric care, sports rehabilitation, orthopaedic physiotherapy, and deconditioning for neurological illnesses. KKLINIKIN’s skilled home physiotherapy team provides the highest quality homecare services throughout the Delhi NCR region.

      Spine Physiotherapist

      The goal of spine physiotherapist is to alleviate discomfort and enable you to perform any activity independently. Physiotherapy can help you strengthen your core muscles and improve your function. The technique entails stretching, stress-relieving exercises, and posture maintenance. We develop a work plan and carry it out step by step based on the patient's symptoms and condition.

      Read More

      Rehabilitation after surgery

      It's been a decade since we discovered that home physiotherapy treatments come in a variety of formats. If you are experiencing chronic pain following surgery, you will be treated by experts to help you return to a pain-free normal life. Any type of persistent pain or discomfort is typical following surgery, but you cannot give up your calm life as a result.

      Read More

      Cardiopulmonary conditioning (CPC)

      Cardiopulmonary training significantly aids in the prevention of heart disease. To avoid heart failure, our therapists seek to optimise the function of the lungs and heart as well as improve muscular strength and flexibility. According to our research and the experience of our home physiotherapist, all muscles require a varied set of exercises to remain fit and healthy.

      Read More

      Neuro physiotherapist

      Neurological rehabilitation frequently improves function, alleviates symptoms, and enhances the patient's well-being. Neurorehabilitation is a multifaceted medical approach that tries to aid in the recovery process following a nervous system damage and to reduce and/or compensate for any functional impairments caused by the injury. It is intended to aid in the treatment of people suffering from nervous system or neurological disorders. Rehabilitation attempts to improve a patient's function, alleviate debilitating symptoms, and enhance their overall quality of life.

      Read More

      Deconditioning

      Deconditioning is a term that refers to reversible changes in the body caused by a reduction in physical activity as a result of extended hospitalisation or other bedridden situations. Its severity is determined by a variety of factors, including the patient's age, the period of physical inactivity, and any coexisting disorders. We facilitate deconditioning rehabilitation services in a manner that is beneficial to the patients. The prescribed gradual training programme improves muscle strength, mobility, ADL performance, walking and endurance as well as balance and coordination.

      Read More

      Orthopedic physiotherapist

      Orthopedic physiotherapy is a significant discipline of medicine that focuses on the treatment of skeletal system injuries and disorders, as well as associated muscles, joints, and ligaments. Additionally, it encompasses pre- and post-operative hip, shoulder, and knee therapy. Our home physiotherapist will begin by doing a thorough clinical assessment and examination, followed by the administration of appropriate treatments. We are committed to identifying the underlying source of the problem and then resolving it. The orthopaedic physiotherapist's treatment goal is to alleviate pain, increase joint range of motion, improve strength and flexibility, and restore the patient to full function.

      Read More

      Feel The Therapy sessions at the comfort of your home in Delhi NCR

      Our one and only aim is to make each patient recover at home by offering the best home physiotherapy near me in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Ghaziabad.

      Why Choose Us

      With cutting-edge health technology and a proven track record of accomplishment, our professional physiotherapist provides the best in class home physiotherapy near me in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida & Ghaziabad region. We are proud to show off our exceptional physiotherapist and chiropractor who conduct home rehabilitative therapy and give personalised support.

      Physiotherapy specialist

      Most people who work in sedentary jobs have little to no movement on a daily basis. It can result in a variety of health complications, forcing the patient to seek the assistance of a physiotherapist at home.

      Reasonable and flexible Physiotherapy service at home

      Our primary objective is to ensure our patients' utmost comfort. That is why we come to you and execute the operations that are necessary to alleviate your pain or condition. We provide a number of flexible appointment times to help you schedule a consultation with one of our highly qualified physiotherapist at home in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida & Ghaziabad.

      Easy to reach us and quick healing

      We offer the best navigation when it comes to curing any pain or any sort of therapy. You can easily make a quick call directly and book your slot as we have the professional physiotherapist at home working with us for years. To reclaim a joyful and enjoyable life, we will assist you and fully repair your body.

      A Perfect and Healthy Body is Considered Much more than a Rich Life!

      “A healthy soul is always happy.” At KKLINIKIN you can rely on us for all type of Physiotherapy services so contact us for our affordable and accountable home physiotherapist and chiropractor in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Ghaziabad.

      FROZEN SHOULDER

      Shoulder discomfort and reduced range of motion are classic symptoms of frozen shoulder. In most cases, frozen shoulder symptoms develop slowly, worsen over time.

      Read More

      SCIATICA

      Sciatica is a term that refers to pain that travels down each leg along the course of the sciatic nerve from the lower back to the hips and buttocks. The condition usually only affects boday.

      Read More
      FAQ

      Frequently Asked Question

      Are you considering physiotherapy at home as an option for rehabilitation? Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about physiotherapy and its treatment approach.

      How physiotherapy aids in pain relief ?

      For patients suffering from an injury or surgery, physiotherapy is one of the most crucial forms of treatment. Our professional Physiotherapist and chiropractor can help you improve your mobility and range of motion, which can help you recuperate faster.

      How much does a physiotherapist charge for a home visit?

      When looking at treatment options for injuries or discomfort, this is an important question to think about. The cost is determined by the severity of the ailment as well as the physiotherapy treatments used.

      If you’re suffering from back pain, cervical discomfort, shoulder pain, or knee pain and want to see a specialised home care physiotherapy in the comfort of your own home in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, or Ghaziabad, you might be asking how much a physiotherapist charge for home visit.

      Our professional physiotherapist at KKLINIKIN deliver customised treatments and rehabilitation plans based on the needs of each individual client.

      Why do you require physiotherapy at home?

      If you feel your physical or mental health is suffering, contact a physiotherapist for home care physiotherapy services in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, and Ghaziabad who can assist you in reducing your discomfort.

      Do you offer home physiotherapy service in Gurgaon?

      Yes we provide home physiotherapy services in Gurgaon. Our team of highly trained and professional physiotherapist offer personalized and customized home physiotherapy treatments as per your condition and requirements.

      We have a wide range of physio services which can be availed at the comfort of your home. Our goal is to help you achieve your optimal health and fitness levels, so that you can lead a happy and fulfilling life. Contact us today to find out more about our home physiotherapy service in Gurgaon.

      What does a physiotherapist who comes to your house do?

      KKLINIKIN’s home visit physiotherapist service is ideal for people who need help with minor diseases, injuries, or chronic pain but can’t commit to an hour-long session at the clinic and want to save time driving. Make an appointment right now for physiotherapy at home in Gurgaon, Delhi, Noida, & Ghaziabad.

      Is it possible to have a female physiotherapist come to your house?

      Female Physiotherapist for home visit can be an excellent option for female patients to receive home care physiotherapy services and treatments without having to leave their homes.  Book your appointment today for female physiotherapist in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, & Ghaziabad.

      What location do you service for home physiotherapy?

      We provide the best physiotherapy services at home in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, and Ghaziabad. Home physiotherapy is extremely beneficial for people who are unable to visit a clinic due to old age, disability or any other health condition. Our trained physiotherapists will visit you at your home and provide you with the necessary treatment.

      We offer a range of services including pain management, post-operative rehabilitation, orthopaedic rehabilitation, sports injury rehabilitation, and more. Our physiotherapists are highly experienced and certified. Contact us today to book an appointment for home physiotherapy services in Delhi NCR (Gurgaon, Noida, and Ghaziabad)
